After informed consent obtain , baseline demographic information , past medical history , dialysis specific information , laboratory metric ( lipid profile , inflammatory marker ) obtain electronic medical record . Subjects undergo standard-of-care hemodialysis routine hemoglobin monitoring Epogen titration accord dialysis center protocol . After 12 week , lipid profile inflammatory marker rechecked obtain electronic medical record .
